review.title: “Good steady work”
review.pros: Pros – Offers steady full time hours. Paycheck given every week. Time off given when ever needed. Friendly, no pressure environment. Simple products to build.
review.cons: Cons – Repetitive work. Hours are not flexible. See no real potential for employee advancement. Assembly processes need to be streamlined and made more efficient.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
